computers.label: mini ITX
description: Computer - mini ITX motherboard
Specifications: Your robot will include a mini ITX motherboard with:
- a CPU socket for an Intel 12th generation processor
- two RAM slots
- an M.2 slot for an NVMe storage drive
- another M.2 slot, that is populated with a WiFi + Bluetooth card
- a PCIe slot for a GPU
Note that this line item is just for the motherboard. Further lines of this
quote will specify the other required computer components and related prices.

computers.label: Raspberry Pi, 4 GB RAM
description: Computer - Raspberry Pi, 4 GB RAM
Specifications: Your robot will include a Raspberry Pi 4, with 4 GB of RAM.
This includes:
- a 64 GB micro-SD card, configured with Clearpath Robotics software
- a power cable from the robot's power supplies
- networking to the robot

computers.label: Nvidia Jetson Nano, 4 GB RAM
description: Computer - Nvidia Jetson Nano
Specifications: Your robot will include an Nvidia Jetson Nano developer kit
This includes:
- a 64 GB micro-SD card, configured with your robot's Clearpath Robotics software
- the Nano's built in 4 GB of RAM
- a power cable from the robot's power supplies
- networking to the robot

computers.label: Nvidia Jetson AGX
description: Computer - Nvidia Jetson AGX
Specifications: Your robot will include an Nvidia Jetson AGX Xavier developer kit
This includes:
- the AGX's built in 32 GB of storage, configured with your robot's Clearpath software
- the AGX's built in 32 GB of RAM
- a power cable from the robot's power supplies
- networking to the robot

processors.label: intel i3
description: Processor - Intel i3
Specifications: Your robot's computer will include a 12th generation Intel i3
processor with an adequate power supply and cooling system to operate at
Intel's power specification.

storage.label: 250 GB, NVMe
description: Storage - 250 GB, NVMe
Specifications: Your robot's computer will include 250 GB of storage using
an NVMe drive. This NVMe drive will be configured with your robot's
Clearpath Robotics software.

Specifications: Your robot's computer will include 500 GB of storage using
an NVMe drive. This NVMe drive will be configured with your robot's
Clearpath Robotics software.

gpu.label: None
description: Empty line item

gpu.label: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti
description: GPU - Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti
Specifications: Your robot's computer will include a graphics card with an
Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti graphics processing unit on its circuit board.
The graphics card manufacturer may be Asus, MSI, Gigabyte, EVGA, ZOTAC,
PNY, Sapphire, or XFX.
The graphics card will be installed in your robot's computer, and will have
sufficient power and air cooling in accordance with the manufacturer's
power specifications.

gpu.label: Nvidia GTX 3060
description: GPU - Nvidia GTX 3060
Specifications: Your robot's computer will include a graphics card with an
Nvidia GTX 3060 graphics processing unit on its circuit board.
The graphics card manufacturer may be Asus, MSI, Gigabyte, EVGA, ZOTAC,
PNY, Sapphire, or XFX.
The graphics card will be installed in your robot's computer, and will have
sufficient power and air cooling in accordance with the manufacturer's
power specifications.
